Paper.Title: Reinterpretation of an existing*NLG system in a Generic Generation Architecture

Section.Paragraph: The RAGS project aims to define a reference architecture for Natural Language Generation (NLG) systems. Currently the major part of this architecture consists of a set of datatype definitions for specifying the input and output formats for modules within NLG systems. In this paper we describe our efforts to reinterpret an existing NLG system in terms of these definitions. The system chosen was the Caption Generation System.
